text: Ezɨ Godɨn Duam arazir aghuir kabar amuasava en naviba fe: arazir bar igharaz darazigh ifongezim, bar akongezim, navir amɨrizim, dughorir amɨrazim, gumazibar akurvagha arazir aghuibar me gami. Egha guizbangɨra mɨgɨa deravɨra bizibagh amua, gumazibar asughasusi, egha navir ghurimɨn araziba dɨkabɨri. Moses Osirizir Arazitam arazir kabar anogoroghezir puvatɨ.
